title: "Artificial intelligence for medical evidence summarization: evaluating the use of large language models"
excerpt: "The quality of the generated summaries was assessed using several automatic metrics, such as ROUGE-L, METEOR, and BLEU, compared to a reference summary. The values of the generated summaries were rated on a scale of 0.0 to 1.0, where a score of 1.0 suggested that the generated summaries matched the reference summary."
